# abbreviated

**Type Property**

Custom cyclic year format style that portrays a shortened cyclic year.

## Declaration

```swift
static var abbreviated: Date.FormatStyle.Symbol.CyclicYear { get }
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/CyclicYear/abbreviated] cyclic year format style is appropriate for space-constrained applications.

## Modifying a Cyclic Year

- **narrow**: Custom cyclic year format style that portrays the shortest representation of a cyclic year.
- **wide**: Custom cyclic year format style that portrays a complete representation of a cyclic year.
